casebody.data:
EHMANN, et al.
v.
MEDFLOW, INC., et al. 433A17-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. September 20, 2018 Matthew N. Leerberg, Attorney at Law, for Medflow, Inc., et al. Harold C. Spears, Christopher P. Raab, Attorneys at Law, for Ehmann, Eugene K., et al. C. Bailey King, Jr., Attorney at Law, for Medflow, Inc., et al. The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 24th of August 2018 by Defendants for Monetary Damages Caused by Frivolous Appeal: "Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 20th of September 2018." Jackson, J. recused
